oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jack Dempsey and Mayor Ben West, circa 1953
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: American boxer Jack Dempsey with Nashville Mayor Ben West and businessman Kermit C. Stengel, Sr., with an unidentified man smoking a cigar, circa 1953. William Harrison “Jack” Dempsey was an American professional boxer and cultural icon of the 1920s. He held the World Heavyweight Championship from 1919 to 1926. In one of the photos, Dempsey is mock punching Mayor West. Pictured left to right: Kermit C. Stengel, Jack Dempsey, Mayor West, and unidentified man. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 2 photograph negatives : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Dempsey, Jack, 1895-1983; West, Ben, 1911-1974; Stengel, Kermit C.
